DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy investigational compound designate PF-03654746 compare placebo treatment adult Tourette 's Syndrome . The study also explore pharmacokinetics PF-03654746 adult Tourette 's Syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Safety And Efficacy Of PF-03654746 In Adult Subjects With Tourette 's Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The study terminate 11-Apr-2012 due internal reassessment priority sponsor . The decision terminate base safety efficacy concern .
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis Tourette 's Syndrome Englishspeaking male female adult 18 55 year age generally good health . Free medication treat tic least 6 week prior randomization . Females childbearing potential must use medically acceptable birth control duration study 28 day study participation . Tic treatment include protocolspecified drug , train ticsuppressing behavioral technique , habit reversal training use Onabotulinum toxin A injection . History neurologic evidence secondary tic disorder , psychosis , bipolar disorder , tardive dyskinesia , untreated unstable DSMIV Axis I disorder require treatment .
